summary: A text message exchange discussing an unnamed friend who is a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. The friend received a settlement but lacks support resources and has been targeted for theft since her story became public. The exchange mentions the involvement of attorney Gloria Allred and government attorneys.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned as an attorney who worked with the victim friend on her claims related to the Epstein case.

connections.description: Gloria Allred is identified as an attorney who worked with the victim on her Epstein-related claims.

events.title: Victim Settlement and Aftermath
events.description: An unnamed victim of Jeffrey Epstein received a settlement but was not provided information on support resources like trafficking organizations. After her story became public, she has been repeatedly robbed, with a specific incident occurring the morning of the text where a man stole her wallet and used her credit card.

locations: Precinct (location where the victim was waiting to see a detective)
keyFacts: An unnamed individual is identified as a friend of the message sender and a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The victim received a settlement from her claims but was not given information on support resources such as trafficking organizations.
Since her story became public news, the victim has been repeatedly targeted and robbed by people assuming she is rich.
A specific theft occurred the morning of the text, where a man stole her wallet and used her credit card, leading her to be at a police precinct.
The victim worked with attorney Gloria Allred and government attorneys on her case.
